GeneDef.label: nanites
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can store a mysterious nanomechanical device. This device can self-replicate without consumption through unknown methods. \nImplants higher-dimensional nanites that decouple consciousness from biological substrate, enabling awareness to persist post-somatic annihilation - though conventional retrieval remains beyond current technology.
GeneDef.resourceDescription: Higher-dimensional nanites are a type of nanomechanical device that is little known, capable of self-replicating without consumption through unknown methods.\n\nThis device possesses a variety of incredible functions, capable of manipulating molecular gravity and temporarily altering physical laws with sufficient reserves.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Fatal wounds are no longer fatal.
